1‚Üíimport express from 'express'
     2‚Üíimport cors from 'cors'
     3‚Üíimport helmet from 'helmet'
     4‚Üíimport compression from 'compression'
     5‚Üíimport rateLimit from 'express-rate-limit'
     6‚Üíimport morgan from 'morgan'
     7‚Üíimport { connectDatabases, closeDatabases, getDatabaseInfo } from '@/database/unified-connection.js'
     8‚Üíimport config from '@/utils/config.js'
     9‚Üíimport logger from '@/utils/logger.js'
    10‚Üíimport createUnifiedRoutes from '@/routes/unified-routes.js'
    11‚Üí
    12‚Üíconst app = express()
    13‚Üí
    14‚Üíapp.use(helmet({
    15‚Üí  contentSecurityPolicy: {
    16‚Üí    directives: {
    17‚Üí      defaultSrc: ["'self'"],
    18‚Üí      styleSrc: ["'self'", "'unsafe-inline'", "https:"],
    19‚Üí      scriptSrc: ["'self'"],
    20‚Üí      imgSrc: ["'self'", "data:", "https:"],
    21‚Üí      connectSrc: ["'self'"],
    22‚Üí      fontSrc: ["'self'", "https:", "data:"],
    23‚Üí      objectSrc: ["'none'"],
    24‚Üí      mediaSrc: ["'self'"],
    25‚Üí      frameSrc: ["'none'"],
    26‚Üí    },
    27‚Üí  },
    28‚Üí  crossOriginEmbedderPolicy: false
    29‚Üí}))
    30‚Üí
    31‚Üíapp.use(cors({
    32‚Üí  origin: config.corsOrigins,
    33‚Üí  credentials: true,
    34‚Üí  methods: ['GET', 'POST', 'PUT', 'DELETE', 'PATCH', 'OPTIONS'],
    35‚Üí  allowedHeaders: ['Content-Type', 'Authorization', 'X-Requested-With']
    36‚Üí}))
    37‚Üí
    38‚Üíapp.use(compression())
    39‚Üí
    40‚Üíconst limiter = rateLimit({
    41‚Üí  windowMs: config.rateLimitWindowMinutes * 60 * 1000,
    42‚Üí  max: config.rateLimitMaxRequests,
    43‚Üí  message: JSON.stringify({
    44‚Üí    success: false,
    45‚Üí    error: 'Too many requests, please try again later.'
    46‚Üí  }),
    47‚Üí  standardHeaders: true,
    48‚Üí  legacyHeaders: false,
    49‚Üí})
    50‚Üí
    51‚Üíapp.use(limiter)
    52‚Üí
    53‚Üíapp.use(morgan('combined', {
    54‚Üí  stream: {
    55‚Üí    write: (message: string) => {
    56‚Üí      logger.info(message.trim())
    57‚Üí    }
    58‚Üí  }
    59‚Üí}))
    60‚Üí
    61‚Üíapp.use(express.json({ limit: '10mb' }))
    62‚Üíapp.use(express.urlencoded({ extended: true, limit: '10mb' }))
    63‚Üí
    64‚Üí// Health check endpoints
    65‚Üíapp.get('/health', (req, res) => {
    66‚Üí  const dbInfo = getDatabaseInfo()
    67‚Üí  res.json({
    68‚Üí    success: true,
    69‚Üí    message: `HeSocial API is running (${dbInfo.type.toUpperCase()})`,
    70‚Üí    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
    71‚Üí    environment: config.nodeEnv,
    72‚Üí    database: dbInfo.description
    73‚Üí  })
    74‚Üí})
    75‚Üí
    76‚Üíapp.get('/api/health', (req, res) => {
    77‚Üí  const dbInfo = getDatabaseInfo()
    78‚Üí  res.json({
    79‚Üí    success: true,
    80‚Üí    message: `API health check passed (${dbInfo.type.toUpperCase()})`,
    81‚Üí    timestamp: new Date().toISOString(),
    82‚Üí    version: '1.0.0',
    83‚Üí    database: dbInfo.type
    84‚Üí  })
    85‚Üí})
    86‚Üí
    87‚Üíapp.use((req, res) => {
    88‚Üí  res.status(404).json({
    89‚Üí    success: false,
    90‚Üí    error: 'Route not found',
    91‚Üí    message: `${req.method} ${req.path} is not a valid endpoint`
    92‚Üí  })
    93‚Üí})
    94‚Üí
    95‚Üíapp.use((error: Error, req: express.Request, res: express.Response, next: express.NextFunction) => {
    96‚Üí  logger.error('Unhandled error:', {
    97‚Üí    error: error.message,
    98‚Üí    stack: error.stack,
    99‚Üí    url: req.url,
   100‚Üí    method: req.method,
   101‚Üí    body: req.body,
   102‚Üí    params: req.params,
   103‚Üí    query: req.query
   104‚Üí  })
   105‚Üí
   106‚Üí  res.status(500).json({
   107‚Üí    success: false,
   108‚Üí    error: config.nodeEnv === 'production' ? 'Internal server error' : error.message,
   109‚Üí    message: 'An unexpected error occurred'
   110‚Üí  })
   111‚Üí})
   112‚Üí
   113‚Üíconst startServer = async (): Promise<void> => {
   114‚Üí  try {
   115‚Üí    const dbInfo = getDatabaseInfo()
   116‚Üí    
   117‚Üí    // Connect to database
   118‚Üí    await connectDatabases()
   119‚Üí    
   120‚Üí    // Dynamically load and mount API routes
   121‚Üí    const apiRoutes = await createUnifiedRoutes()
   122‚Üí    app.use('/api', apiRoutes)
   123‚Üí    
   124‚Üí    const server = app.listen(config.port, () => {
   125‚Üí      logger.info(`üöÄ HeSocial API server running on port ${config.port}`)
   126‚Üí      logger.info(`üì± Environment: ${config.nodeEnv}`)
   127‚Üí      logger.info(`üóÑÔ∏è  Database: ${dbInfo.description}`)
   128‚Üí      logger.info(`üîí CORS Origins: ${config.corsOrigins.join(', ')}`)
   129‚Üí      logger.info(`üìù Health Check: http://localhost:${config.port}/api/health`)
   130‚Üí      logger.info(`üéØ Events API: http://localhost:${config.port}/api/events`)
   131‚Üí    })
   132‚Üí
   133‚Üí    const gracefulShutdown = async (signal: string): Promise<void> => {
   134‚Üí      logger.info(`Received ${signal}. Starting graceful shutdown...`)
   135‚Üí      
   136‚Üí      server.close(async () => {
   137‚Üí        logger.info('HTTP server closed')
   138‚Üí        
   139‚Üí        try {
   140‚Üí          await closeDatabases()
   141‚Üí          logger.info('Graceful shutdown completed')
   142‚Üí          process.exit(0)
   143‚Üí        } catch (error) {
   144‚Üí          logger.error('Error during graceful shutdown:', error)
   145‚Üí          process.exit(1)
   146‚Üí        }
   147‚Üí      })
   148‚Üí    }
   149‚Üí
   150‚Üí    process.on('SIGTERM', () => gracefulShutdown('SIGTERM'))
   151‚Üí    process.on('SIGINT', () => gracefulShutdown('SIGINT'))
   152‚Üí
   153‚Üí  } catch (error) {
   154‚Üí    logger.error('Failed to start server:', error)
   155‚Üí    process.exit(1)
   156‚Üí  }
   157‚Üí}
   158‚Üí
   159‚Üíif (import.meta.url === `file://${process.argv[1]}`) {
   160‚Üí  startServer()
   161‚Üí}
   162‚Üí
   163‚Üíexport default app

import dotenv from 'dotenv'
import { DatabaseConfig, RedisConfig, EmailConfig, StripeConfig, OAuthConfig } from '@/types/index.js'

dotenv.config()

interface Config {
  port: number
  nodeEnv: string
  jwtSecret: string
  jwtExpiresIn: string
  database: DatabaseConfig
  redis: RedisConfig
  email: EmailConfig
  stripe: StripeConfig
  oauth: OAuthConfig
  corsOrigins: string[]
  rateLimitWindowMinutes: number
  rateLimitMaxRequests: number
  fileUploadMaxSize: number
  fileUploadPath: string
}

const config: Config = {
  port: parseInt(process.env.PORT || '5000', 10),
  nodeEnv: process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development',
  jwtSecret: process.env.JWT_SECRET || 'fallback-secret-key-change-in-production',
  jwtExpiresIn: process.env.JWT_EXPIRES_IN || '7d',

  database: {
    host: process.env.DB_HOST || 'localhost',
    port: parseInt(process.env.DB_PORT || '5432', 10),
    database: process.env.DB_NAME || 'hesocial',
    username: process.env.DB_USER || '',
    password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD || 'password',
    ssl: process.env.DB_SSL === 'true'
  },

  redis: {
    host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
    port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379', 10),
    password: process.env.REDIS_PASSWORD || ''
  },

  email: {
    host: process.env.EMAIL_HOST || 'smtp.ethereal.email',
    port: parseInt(process.env.EMAIL_PORT || '587', 10),
    secure: process.env.EMAIL_SECURE === 'true',
    auth: {
      user: process.env.EMAIL_USER || '',
      pass: process.env.EMAIL_PASS || ''
    }
  },

  stripe: {
    publicKey: process.env.STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY || '',
    secretKey: process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY || '',
    webhookSecret: process.env.STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET || ''
  },

  oauth: {
    google: {
      clientId: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID || '',
      clientSecret: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET || ''
    },
    linkedin: {
      clientId: process.env.LINKEDIN_CLIENT_ID || '',
      clientSecret: process.env.LINKEDIN_CLIENT_SECRET || ''
    }
  },

  corsOrigins: process.env.CORS_ORIGINS?.split(',') || ['http://localhost:3000'],
  rateLimitWindowMinutes: parseInt(process.env.RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MINUTES || '15', 10),
  rateLimitMaxRequests: parseInt(process.env.RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS || '100', 10),
  fileUploadMaxSize: parseInt(process.env.FILE_UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE || '10485760', 10), // 10MB
  fileUploadPath: process.env.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH || './uploads'
}

file.content:
export interface User {
  id: string
  email: string
  firstName: string
  lastName: string
  age: number
  profession: string
  annualIncome: number
  netWorth: number
  membershipTier: 'Platinum' | 'Diamond' | 'Black Card'
  privacyLevel: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5
  isVerified: boolean
  verificationStatus: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
  profilePicture?: string
  bio?: string
  interests: string[]
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
  deletedAt?: Date
}

export interface Event {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  dateTime: Date
  registrationDeadline: Date
  venueId: string
  categoryId: string
  organizerId: string
  pricing: EventPricing
  exclusivityLevel: 'VIP' | 'VVIP' | 'Invitation Only'
  dressCode: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5
  capacity: number
  currentAttendees: number
  amenities: string[]
  privacyGuarantees: string[]
  images: string[]
  videoUrl?: string
  requirements: EventRequirement[]
  isActive: boolean
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface Venue {
  id: string
  name: string
  address: string
  city: string
  coordinates: {
    lat: number
    lng: number
  }
  rating: number
  amenities: string[]
  images: string[]
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface EventCategory {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  icon: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface EventPricing {
  vip?: number
  vvip?: number
  general?: number
  currency: 'TWD' | 'USD'
  installmentOptions?: number[]
}

export interface EventRequirement {
  type: 'age' | 'income' | 'membership' | 'verification'
  value: string | number
  description: string
}

export interface Registration {
  id: string
  userId: string
  eventId: string
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected' | 'cancelled'
  paymentStatus: 'pending' | 'paid' | 'refunded'
  paymentIntentId?: string
  specialRequests?: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface FinancialVerification {
  id: string
  userId: string
  incomeProofUrl: string
  assetDocuments: Record<string, any>
  verificationDate?: Date
  verifiedBy?: string
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
  notes?: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

import { Request } from 'express'

export interface AuthenticatedRequest extends Request {
  user?: User;
}

export interface JwtPayload {
  userId: string
  email: string
  membershipTier: string
  iat?: number
  exp?: number
}

export interface ApiResponse<T = any> {
  success: boolean
  data?: T
  message?: string
  error?: string
  pagination?: {
    page: number
    limit: number
    total: number
    totalPages: number
  }
}

export interface DatabaseConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  database: string
  username: string
  password: string
  ssl?: boolean
}

export interface RedisConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  password?: string
}

export interface EmailConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  secure: boolean
  auth: {
    user: string
    pass: string
  }
}

export interface StripeConfig {
  publicKey: string
  secretKey: string
  webhookSecret: string
}

export interface OAuthConfig {
  google: {
    clientId: string
    clientSecret: string
  }
  linkedin: {
    clientId: string
    clientSecret: string
  }
}

import dotenv from 'dotenv'
import { DatabaseConfig, RedisConfig, EmailConfig, StripeConfig, OAuthConfig } from '@/types/index.js'

dotenv.config()

interface Config {
  port: number
  nodeEnv: string
  jwtSecret: string
  jwtExpiresIn: string
  database: DatabaseConfig
  redis: RedisConfig
  email: EmailConfig
  stripe: StripeConfig
  oauth: OAuthConfig
  corsOrigins: string[]
  rateLimitWindowMinutes: number
  rateLimitMaxRequests: number
  fileUploadMaxSize: number
  fileUploadPath: string
}

const config: Config = {
  port: parseInt(process.env.PORT || '5000', 10),
  nodeEnv: process.env.NODE_ENV || 'development',
  jwtSecret: process.env.JWT_SECRET || 'fallback-secret-key-change-in-production',
  jwtExpiresIn: process.env.JWT_EXPIRES_IN || '7d',

  database: {
    host: process.env.DB_HOST || 'localhost',
    port: parseInt(process.env.DB_PORT || '5432', 10),
    database: process.env.DB_NAME || 'hesocial',
    username: process.env.DB_USER || '',
    password: process.env.DB_PASSWORD || 'password',
    ssl: process.env.DB_SSL === 'true'
  },

  redis: {
    host: process.env.REDIS_HOST || 'localhost',
    port: parseInt(process.env.REDIS_PORT || '6379', 10),
    password: process.env.REDIS_PASSWORD || ''
  },

  email: {
    host: process.env.EMAIL_HOST || 'smtp.ethereal.email',
    port: parseInt(process.env.EMAIL_PORT || '587', 10),
    secure: process.env.EMAIL_SECURE === 'true',
    auth: {
      user: process.env.EMAIL_USER || '',
      pass: process.env.EMAIL_PASS || ''
    }
  },

  stripe: {
    publicKey: process.env.STRIPE_PUBLIC_KEY || '',
    secretKey: process.env.STRIPE_SECRET_KEY || '',
    webhookSecret: process.env.STRIPE_WEBHOOK_SECRET || ''
  },

  oauth: {
    google: {
      clientId: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_ID || '',
      clientSecret: process.env.GOOGLE_CLIENT_SECRET || ''
    },
    linkedin: {
      clientId: process.env.LINKEDIN_CLIENT_ID || '',
      clientSecret: process.env.LINKEDIN_CLIENT_SECRET || ''
    }
  },

  corsOrigins: process.env.CORS_ORIGINS?.split(',') || ['http://localhost:3000'],
  rateLimitWindowMinutes: parseInt(process.env.RATE_LIMIT_WINDOW_MINUTES || '15', 10),
  rateLimitMaxRequests: parseInt(process.env.RATE_LIMIT_MAX_REQUESTS || '100', 10),
  fileUploadMaxSize: parseInt(process.env.FILE_UPLOAD_MAX_SIZE || '10485760', 10), // 10MB
  fileUploadPath: process.env.FILE_UPLOAD_PATH || './uploads'
}

export default config

export interface User {
  id: string
  email: string
  firstName: string
  lastName: string
  age: number
  profession: string
  annualIncome: number
  netWorth: number
  membershipTier: 'Platinum' | 'Diamond' | 'Black Card'
  privacyLevel: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5
  isVerified: boolean
  verificationStatus: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
  profilePicture?: string
  bio?: string
  interests: string[]
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
  deletedAt?: Date
}

export interface Event {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  dateTime: Date
  registrationDeadline: Date
  venueId: string
  categoryId: string
  organizerId: string
  pricing: EventPricing
  exclusivityLevel: 'VIP' | 'VVIP' | 'Invitation Only'
  dressCode: 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5
  capacity: number
  currentAttendees: number
  amenities: string[]
  privacyGuarantees: string[]
  images: string[]
  videoUrl?: string
  requirements: EventRequirement[]
  isActive: boolean
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface Venue {
  id: string
  name: string
  address: string
  city: string
  coordinates: {
    lat: number
    lng: number
  }
  rating: number
  amenities: string[]
  images: string[]
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface EventCategory {
  id: string
  name: string
  description: string
  icon: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface EventPricing {
  vip?: number
  vvip?: number
  general?: number
  currency: 'TWD' | 'USD'
  installmentOptions?: number[]
}

export interface EventRequirement {
  type: 'age' | 'income' | 'membership' | 'verification'
  value: string | number
  description: string
}

export interface Registration {
  id: string
  userId: string
  eventId: string
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected' | 'cancelled'
  paymentStatus: 'pending' | 'paid' | 'refunded'
  paymentIntentId?: string
  specialRequests?: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

export interface FinancialVerification {
  id: string
  userId: string
  incomeProofUrl: string
  assetDocuments: Record<string, any>
  verificationDate?: Date
  verifiedBy?: string
  status: 'pending' | 'approved' | 'rejected'
  notes?: string
  createdAt: Date
  updatedAt: Date
}

import { Request } from 'express'

export interface AuthenticatedRequest extends Request {
  user?: User;
}

export interface JwtPayload {
  userId: string
  email: string
  membershipTier: string
  iat?: number
  exp?: number
}

export interface ApiResponse<T = any> {
  success: boolean
  data?: T
  message?: string
  error?: string
  pagination?: {
    page: number
    limit: number
    total: number
    totalPages: number
  }
}

export interface DatabaseConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  database: string
  username: string
  password: string
  ssl?: boolean
}

export interface RedisConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  password?: string
}

export interface EmailConfig {
  host: string
  port: number
  secure: boolean
  auth: {
    user: string
    pass: string
  }
}

export interface StripeConfig {
  publicKey: string
  secretKey: string
  webhookSecret: string
}

export interface OAuthConfig {
  google: {
    clientId: string
    clientSecret: string
  }
  linkedin: {
    clientId: string
    clientSecret: string
  }
}

- `backend/.env.example:7` - Updated to show DuckDB is embedded

Your backend now exclusively uses DuckDB with no PostgreSQL or Redis dependencies. The system is streamlined for production with a single, consistent datastore configuration.
